H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1366.def: = a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H5066.def: = state in which objects are close to other objects in space

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H3734.def: = a unit of both dry and liquid measure of approximately 220 liters; equals 1 {L:homer<SDBH:חֹמֶר>}

H5560.def: = finely ground flour ◄ from only the inner kernel of the wheat, resulting in a high quality flour

H8346.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H7058.def: = flour made from ground grain kernels, ► used for baking bread, as ingredient for food, and as grain offering

H1277.def: = state in which a human or animal has a lot of excess fat; ≈ considered a sign of health and wealth

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H7471.def: = open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats, ► as a result of which these animals produce a certain quality of meat

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H905.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H354.def: = wild animal, standing about a meter high, that ruminates, and of which the male grows antlers, which are dropped every year; has a reddish fur with white spots during summer; during winter the white spots disappear and the coat becomes darker; ◄ belongs to family of cervidae; ► clean animal and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with strength, speed, and agility; the male is also associated with sexual prowess

H3180.def: = a large antelope that is about 1.5 meters (5 feet) high at the shoulder, with a long face with a large lump on the head from which short thick horns sprout; it is reddish brown in color; lives on plains and grazes in herds; it can run fast; ► a clean animal that people were allowed to eat

H75.def: = to cause an animal to be fat ◄ by giving it special food ► so that it can be slaughtered and eaten; ≈ fat food was highly appreciated

H1257.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = large bird with webbed feet and probably white of color; ► fattened and served at King {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}'s table

H7287.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise authority over (other) humans, animals, and areas, often with focus on the manner in which this is done

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8607.def: = town; ◄ at north-eastern boundary of kingdom of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5804.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H983.def: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

H1835.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H884.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:Negeb<SDBH:נֶגֶב>}, at the southern border of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► used esp. in combination with {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>} at the northern border of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} to refer to all Israel

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H8384.def: = a tree that reaches a height of 5-8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree"

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H705.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H723.def: = building ► for keeping horses and storing related objects such as chariots

H4817.def: = a group of {L:chariots<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}, usually owned by one single person

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5324.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position

H3557.def: = state in which a container is able to accomodate something within its available space

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H7979.def: literally: something that has been spread out; hence: = a flat surface on which food has been spread out for eating ◄ usually made of wood but can be a piece of animal skin or leather ► used in private and public occasions, and frequently for sacred uses in the tabernacle and temple

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H8184.def: = a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

H8401.def: = dried stalks of grain and grasses, usually left over from harvesting grain ► used as food for animals or as an ingredient for making clay bricks; ≈ associated with something of little value

H7409.def: = a fast {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>}, selectively bred for speed

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H8394.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H2344.def: = minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea-shore, river-beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H2449.def: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H387.def: = state of not being subject to change

H1968.def: = man; ◄ son of  {L:Mahol<SDBH:מָחֹול>}; ► recognized as a wise man; in the time of kings {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H3633.def: = man; ◄ son of  {L:Mahol<SDBH:מָחֹול>}; ► recognized as a wise man; in the time of kings {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H1862.def: = man; ◄ son of  {L:Mahol<SDBH:מָחֹול>}; ► recognized as a wise man; in the time of kings {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H4235.def: = action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H4912.def: = an utterance, often in poetic style, that has a specific message, such as an oracle, words of advice, wisdom, or mockery

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H730.def: = evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H231.def: = plant with a shrub-like base and stems which are erect, stiff and strong; it reaches a height of just under one meter; it may grow from the ground but also spring out of crevices in walls, cliffs and rocks; its leaves and branches are hairy, and its flowers white; ◄ origanum maru; ► the plant is aromatic, and the dried leaves are used as a condiments; the leaves and little branches, when collected in bunches, are suitable for sprinkling purposes, as the hairy surface holds the liquid; used in the ritual purification of the Jews

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7023.def: = flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H7431.def: = a general term for small animals with short or no legs

H1709.def: = collective designation of various cold-blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2451.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
